headline: Does the Recent Smucker Stock Dip Signal New Value for Investors in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with J. M. Smucker stock? You’re not alone. Whether you’ve got it in your portfolio or you’re eyeing it for a possible buy, it’s natural to zero in on the numbers and wonder if now’s the right time to act. After all, the company’s stock has seen its share of moves lately, closing most recently at $104.75. Over the past week, Smucker is down 2.1%, and looking a bit further back, it’s slipped 2.8% in the past month. Year-to-date, it’s posted a 5.9% decline, and over...
